titles.title: Supporting the designation of the week of February 26 to March 4, 2017, as "National Spinal CSF Leak Awareness Week".
Supporting the designation of the week of February 26 to March 4, 2017, as "National Spinal CSF Leak Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the designation of National Spinal CSF (cerebrospinal fluid) Leak Awareness Week. (CSF is the fluid that surrounds the brain and spinal cord. CSF leaks can cause intense headaches.)
